page.title: 10POLEGATE CARNIVAL
page.content:
EVERY YEAR IN POLEGATE THERE IS A CARNIVAL @ THE END OF JUNE. LOTS OF PEOPLE DRESS UP IN FUNNY COSTUMES AND JOIN A PROCESSION THAT LEADS ALONG SAYERLANDS, OAKLEAF DRIVE AND DOWN THE HIGH STREET.
ONE YEAR I DRESSED UP IN A DIRTY COSTUME TO GO IN THE SCHOOL ENTRY AS ONE OF THE ARTFUL DODGER'S GANG. LOTS OF PEOPLE WATCH AND IT MAKES ME FEEL PROUD. IN THIS YEAR'S CARNIVAL, I SAW A MAN WHO WAS 3 SOLDIERS! HE NAMED THEM TOM, DICK AND HARRY! HE WAS THE MIDDLE ONE - DICK!
AT THE END OF THE PROCESSION WE WENT TO THE PARK WHERE THERE WERE LOTS OF AMUSEMENTS, LIKE A RAFFLE, DARTS AND THROWING BALLS INTO A JAR TO WIN A PRIZE. IT WAS A BRILLIANT DAY.
